title: Staff of Cherished Necromancy
content: Staff of Cherished Necromancy Very Rare 4~12 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Necrotic Heightened Necromancy: Creatures have Disadvantage on Saving Throws against your Necromancy spells. Life Essence Harvest: When the wielder kills a hostile creature with a spell, they greedily absorb its energy and gain Life Essence until their next Long Rest. Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTopple Unlike their father, Thibault, Cherish Hollow was not afraid of zombie
